physical_appearance:This is a set of two badges from Force 136. The top one is rectangular shaped
 and striped in the colours blue
 yellow
 red and light blue. The badge below it is in the shape of a circle. Within it
 there is a bird with outstretched wings against a beige background. Underneath the bird
 there is a red flame pattern. The thread on the right of the badge is slightly frayed.

metadata.title_text: Lung Chui Ying Collection: Force 136 badge ????? Lung Chiu Ying Collection: Force 136 badge
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a set of two badges from Force 136. The top one is rectangular shaped, and striped in the colours blue, yellow, red and light blue. The badge below it is in the shape of a circle. Within it, there is a bird with outstretched wings against a beige background. Underneath the bird, there is a red flame pattern. The thread on the right of the badge is slightly frayed.
